MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL32 postcode area of Dolgarrog, affecting properties in Conway Road and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 09.00am due to a fault on our overhead line network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 12.00 noon. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08.10am on 27th April 2021.
